fields.name: Barbell Bench Press
fields.description: A compound movement that targets the chest.
fields.starting_position: Lie on the bench with the barbell at arm's length.
fields.execution: Lower the barbell to the chest and press it back up.
fields.tips: Keep your feet flat on the ground and avoid arching your back excessively.

fields.name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
fields.description: An upper-chest exercise using dumbbells on an incline bench.
fields.starting_position: Lie on an incline bench, holding dumbbells at chest height.
fields.execution: Press the dumbbells up until arms are extended.
fields.tips: Keep a slight bend in your elbows and control the weights throughout the movement.

fields.name: Pec Deck
fields.description: Machine exercise targeting the chest muscles.
fields.starting_position: Sit on the machine with arms extended.
fields.execution: Bring your arms together in front of your chest.
fields.tips: Focus on squeezing the chest at the peak of the movement.

fields.name: Cable Crossover
fields.description: A cable exercise for targeting the chest.
fields.starting_position: Stand in front of two cable machines with handles.
fields.execution: Pull the cables together in front of you, elbows slightly bent.
fields.tips: Keep a slight bend in your elbows to prevent injury and fully engage the chest.

fields.name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
fields.description: An upper-chest exercise using a barbell on an incline bench.
fields.starting_position: Lie on an incline bench, barbell at arm's length.
fields.execution: Lower the barbell to the upper chest and press it back up.
fields.tips: Do not bounce the bar off your chest, and maintain control throughout.

fields.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
fields.description: A free-weight chest exercise with dumbbells.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand at chest height.
fields.execution: Press the dumbbells up until arms are extended.
fields.tips: Do not let the elbows drop too far below the bench level to prevent shoulder strain.

fields.name: Dumbbell Fly
fields.description: A chest exercise using dumbbells to target the pectoral muscles.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
fields.execution: With arms slightly bent, lower the dumbbells to the sides and bring them together.
fields.tips: Perform the movement slowly and with control to fully stretch the chest.

fields.name: Incline Dumbbell Fly
fields.description: An incline version of the dumbbell fly for the upper chest.
fields.starting_position: Lie on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
fields.execution: With arms slightly bent, lower the dumbbells out to the sides and bring them together.
fields.tips: Focus on maintaining a consistent range of motion and avoid overextending your shoulders.

fields.name: Chest Press Machine
fields.description: A machine-based exercise that isolates the chest muscles.
fields.starting_position: Sit in the chest press machine with hands gripping the handles.
fields.execution: Push the handles forward while keeping the elbows slightly bent.
fields.tips: Keep your back pressed firmly against the seat and avoid arching your spine.

fields.name: Barbell Declined Bench Press
fields.description: A decline version of the bench press that targets the lower chest.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a decline bench with the barbell at arm's length.
fields.execution: Lower the barbell to the lower chest and press it back up.
fields.tips: Keep a controlled movement and avoid bouncing the bar off your chest.

fields.name: Push-Up
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
fields.starting_position: Start in a plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
fields.execution: Lower your body to the ground and push yourself back up.
fields.tips: Keep your core tight and your body in a straight line throughout the movement.

fields.name: Dips
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise for chest, triceps, and shoulders.
fields.starting_position: Suspend yourself on parallel bars with arms straight.
fields.execution: Lower your body by bending your arms, then push yourself back up.
fields.tips: Lean forward slightly to focus more on the chest, and control the descent.

fields.name: Landmine Press
fields.description: A compound exercise using a landmine attachment to work the chest and shoulders.
fields.starting_position: Stand facing the landmine machine, gripping the barbell with both hands.
fields.execution: Press the barbell up and forward, extending your arms fully.
fields.tips: Engage your core to maintain stability during the press.

fields.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
fields.description: A variation of the bench press that targets the triceps more.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a bench with your hands positioned closer than shoulder-width apart.
fields.execution: Lower the barbell to your chest and press it back up.
fields.tips: Keep your elbows close to your body during the movement to avoid shoulder strain.

fields.name: Triceps Pushdown
fields.description: A cable exercise specifically targeting the triceps.
fields.starting_position: Stand in front of a cable machine, gripping the bar with both hands.
fields.execution: Push the bar down toward your thighs, fully extending your arms.
fields.tips: Keep your elbows stationary and only move your forearms.

fields.name: Skull Crushers
fields.description: An isolation exercise for the triceps using an EZ bar or dumbbells.
fields.starting_position: Lie on a bench with an EZ bar or dumbbells extended above your chest.
fields.execution: Lower the weight toward your forehead by bending your elbows, then extend your arms back up.
fields.tips: Perform the movement slowly and with control to avoid hitting your forehead.

fields.name: Overhead Triceps Extension
fields.description: A triceps exercise that targets the long head of the triceps.
fields.starting_position: Sit or stand holding a dumbbell with both hands, arms extended overhead.
fields.execution: Lower the dumbbell behind your head, then extend your arms back up.
fields.tips: Keep your elbows as still as possible and avoid using momentum.

fields.name: Triceps Dips (Bench)
fields.description: A triceps-focused variation of dips using a bench for support.
fields.starting_position: Sit on a bench with your hands placed beside your hips, feet flat on the floor.
fields.execution: Lower your body down by bending your elbows, then push yourself back up.
fields.tips: Keep your back close to the bench and focus on your triceps to push up.

fields.name: Diamond Push-Up
fields.description: A push-up variation that emphasizes the triceps.
fields.starting_position: Start in a plank position, hands placed close together under your chest to form a diamond shape.
fields.execution: Lower your body to the ground, keeping your elbows tight to your sides, then push back up.
fields.tips: Maintain a solid plank position throughout the exercise and focus on the triceps.

fields.name: Cable Triceps Extension
fields.description: A cable exercise targeting the triceps, particularly the long head.
fields.starting_position: Stand in front of a cable machine with a rope attachment.
fields.execution: Extend your arms down and out in front of your body, then return to the starting position.
fields.tips: Focus on squeezing the triceps at the bottom of the movement.

fields.name: Squats
fields.description: A fundamental compound movement that targets the lower body, especially the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, back straight, and hands at your sides or on your hips.
fields.execution: Lower your body by bending your knees and hips, then push through your heels to stand back up.
fields.tips: Keep your chest up and your knees aligned with your toes. Avoid letting your knees cave inward.

fields.name: Goblet Squat
fields.description: A squat variation with a dumbbell or kettlebell held close to your chest, focusing on form and mobility.
fields.starting_position: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell or kettlebell with both hands close to your chest.
fields.execution: Lower into a squat, keeping your chest up and the weight close to your body, then push through your heels to return to standing.
fields.tips: Engage your core to help maintain balance, and keep your knees tracking over your toes.

fields.name: Deadlift
fields.description: A compound movement that primarily works the hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet hip-width apart, the barbell over the middle of your feet, and your hands shoulder-width apart on the bar.
fields.execution: Push through your heels to lift the bar, extending your hips and knees simultaneously. Lower the bar with control.
fields.tips: Maintain a neutral spine throughout the movement, and avoid rounding your back when lifting the weight.

fields.name: Romanian Deadlift
fields.description: A variation of the deadlift that focuses more on the hamstrings and glutes.
fields.starting_position: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell or dumbbells in front of your thighs.
fields.execution: Push your hips back, keeping the weight close to your body, then return to the starting position by driving your hips forward.
fields.tips: Keep a slight bend in your knees and focus on hinging at the hips rather than bending at the waist.

fields.name: Lunges
fields.description: A lower-body exercise that works the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
fields.starting_position: Stand upright with feet hip-width apart, hands at your sides or on your hips.
fields.execution: Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at 90-degree angles. Push through the front foot to return to standing.
fields.tips: Keep your upper body upright and avoid letting your front knee extend beyond your toes.

fields.name: Leg Press
fields.description: A machine-based exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
fields.starting_position: Sit on the leg press machine with feet placed on the platform shoulder-width apart.
fields.execution: Push the platform away by extending your legs, then slowly return to the starting position.
fields.tips: Do not lock your knees at the top of the movement, and control the weight as you return.

fields.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
fields.description: A single-leg squat variation that targets the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.
fields.starting_position: Stand a few feet away from a bench with one foot resting on the bench behind you.
fields.execution: Lower your hips, bending the front knee, until your thigh is parallel to the floor. Push back up to the starting position.
fields.tips: Keep your chest upright and avoid letting your front knee extend too far past your toes.

fields.name: Step-Up
fields.description: A simple movement that works the quads, hamstrings, and glutes by stepping onto a raised platform.
fields.starting_position: Stand in front of a bench or box with feet hip-width apart.
fields.execution: Step one foot onto the platform, then drive through that foot to bring the other foot up. Step back down and repeat on the other side.
fields.tips: Make sure your knee tracks over your toes during the step-up to avoid unnecessary strain.

fields.name: Hip Thrust
fields.description: A glute-focused exercise that targets the glutes, hamstrings, and quads.
fields.starting_position: Sit on the floor with your upper back against a bench, barbell over your hips.
fields.execution: Drive through your heels and thrust your hips upward, fully extending your hips at the top, then lower back down.
fields.tips: Keep your chin tucked and your core engaged throughout the movement to protect your lower back.
